title: STK Boston operates Monday-Thursday 11am-12am, Friday-Saturday 11am-1am, Sunday 10am-11pm
statement: STK Boston is open Monday through Thursday from 11am to 12am, Friday and Saturday from 11am to 1am, and Sunday from 10am to 11pm.

citations.quote: STK Boston is open Monday – Thursday from 11am – 12am, Friday & Saturday from 11am – 1am, and Sunday from 10am – 11pm.
